title: One Of Us Dropped The Ball Big Time With Our Significant Other
description:
Our producer Romeo has told us about his girlfriend potentially moving to the city to be with him. And this past weekend, she came into town to visit. It was his one chance to convince her how great the city is, but he dropped the ball! Listen...
